enabled.title: Two factor authentication is enabled
enabled.description:
Congrats! You're secure!
To disable 2FA for your account, click the button below.

not-enabled.title: Two factor authentication is not enabled
not-enabled.description: Two factor authentication is not enabled for your account. Click the button below to set it up.

generating.scan-code: Scan the code on the left with your 2FA app.
generating.description: Fill in your One Time Password and click 'Validate & enable' to check the code and enable 2FA for your admin account.
